subject: Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
Women's British Open (Golf)
Kraft Nabisco Championship (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Inbee Park of South Korea won her fifth career major in August and is among the favorites at The Evian Championship this week, even as she manages her wedding plans.
snippet: Inbee Park of South Korea won her fifth career major in August and is among the favorites at The Evian Championship this week, even as she manages her wedding plans.
